title: Gustav_2008
description: Hurricane Gustav-2008, Calibration event Geometry: Existing Condition with 2022 Survey Data (213 bridges, 541 Culverts), Survey bathymetry, 20 Pumps (source: USCAE SLaMM May 2022, etc.). Geometry version: 2024-03-28 Flow: AORC Gridded Precipitation 2001-2020 (CST) + .. SCROLL DOWN CRPA ADCIRC Variable WSE Stage in southern boundary +  Inflows BC (preliminary) using SLaMM model runs Plan: Hurricane Gustav 2008 (Sep 1-Sep 6) LiDAR: USGS NED, CoNED, LaDOTD Infiltration Loss: 2D gridded Initial and Deficit Method Manning's n layer: NLCD 2019, CCAP 2016, LaDOTD roadways, Microsoft GitHub building footprints Structures: Field Survey Data Bathymetry: Bayou Terrebonne, Bayou Black, Bayou Blue, etc.
